data.name: Metagross
data.flavorText: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

data.name: Rhyperior
data.flavorText: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening then expanding muscles instantly.

data.name: Articuno
data.flavorText: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

data.name: Camerupt
data.flavorText: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts violently.

data.name: Chimecho
data.flavorText: Its cries echo inside its hollow body to emerge as beautiful notes for startling and repelling foes.

data.name: Claydol
data.flavorText: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

data.name: Dodrio
data.flavorText: When Doduo evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

data.name: Honchkrow
data.flavorText: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."

data.name: Lunatone
data.flavorText: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

data.name: Medicham
data.flavorText: It gains the ability to see the aura of its opponents by honing its mind through starvation.

data.name: Moltres
data.flavorText: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

data.name: Mr. Mime
data.flavorText: It shapes an invisible wall in midair by minutely vibrating its fingertips to stop molecules in the air.

data.name: Parasect
data.flavorText: A mushroom grown larger than the host's body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.

data.name: Primeape
data.flavorText: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.

data.name: Sandslash
data.flavorText: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

data.name: Seaking
data.flavorText: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

data.name: Shedinja
data.flavorText: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.

data.name: Solrock
data.flavorText: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.

data.name: Spinda
data.flavorText: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

data.name: Wailord
data.flavorText: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

data.name: Zapdos
data.flavorText: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

data.name: Arcanine
data.flavorText: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.

data.name: Bibarel
data.flavorText: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.

data.name: Breloom
data.flavorText: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.

data.name: Carnivine
data.flavorText: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

data.name: Cherrim
data.flavorText: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.

data.name: Drifblim
data.flavorText: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.

data.name: Floatzel
data.flavorText: It is a common sight around fishing ports. It is known to rescue people and carry off prey.

data.name: Gabite
data.flavorText: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

data.name: Hippopotas
data.flavorText: It shuts its nostrils tight then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around ten.

data.name: Ivysaur
data.flavorText: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.

data.name: Lopunny
data.flavorText: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

data.name: Loudred
data.flavorText: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

data.name: Magmar
data.flavorText: When it breathes deeply, heat waves form around its body, making it hard to see clearly.

data.name: Marshtomp
data.flavorText: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

data.name: Masquerain
data.flavorText: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.

data.name: Metang
data.flavorText: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.

data.name: Milotic
data.flavorText: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.

data.name: Minun
data.flavorText: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

data.name: Murkrow
data.flavorText: If spotted, it will lure an unwary person into chasing it, then lose the pursuer on mountain trails.

data.name: Ninjask
data.flavorText: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

data.name: Numel
data.flavorText: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.

data.name: Pinsir
data.flavorText: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.

data.name: Plusle
data.flavorText: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.

data.name: Raichu
data.flavorText: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

data.name: Relicanth
data.flavorText: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

data.name: Rhydon
data.flavorText: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.

data.name: Roserade
data.flavorText: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.

data.name: Rotom
data.flavorText: Its electric-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

data.name: Staravia
data.flavorText: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

data.name: Wailmer
data.flavorText: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.

data.name: Yanma
data.flavorText: It can hover is one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.

data.name: Baltoy
data.flavorText: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

data.name: Beldum
data.flavorText: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

data.name: Bidoof
data.flavorText: A comparison revealed that Bidoof's front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata's.

data.name: Buizel
data.flavorText: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.

data.name: Bulbasaur
data.flavorText: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

data.name: Buneary
data.flavorText: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.

data.name: Chatot
data.flavorText: Its tongue is just like a human's. As a result, it can cleverly mimic human speech.

data.name: Cherubi
data.flavorText: The small ball is not only filled with nutrients, it is also tasty. Starly try to peck it off.

data.name: Chimchar
data.flavorText: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.

data.name: Chingling
data.flavorText: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

data.name: Combee
data.flavorText: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

data.name: Corphish
data.flavorText: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

data.name: Croagunk
data.flavorText: It rarely fights fairly, but that is strictly to ensure survival. It is popular as a mascot.

data.name: Doduo
data.flavorText: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

data.name: Drifloon
data.flavorText: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a "Signpost for Wandering Spirits."

data.name: Feebas
data.flavorText: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.

data.name: Geodude
data.flavorText: At rest, it looks just like a rock. Carelessly stepping on it will make it swing its fists angrily.

data.name: Gible
data.flavorText: It attacks using its huge mouth. While its attacks are powerful, it hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.

data.name: Goldeen
data.flavorText: Though it appears very elegant when swimming with fins unfurled, it can jab powerfully with its horn.

data.name: Growlithe
data.flavorText: A Pokémon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.

data.name: Kricketot
data.flavorText: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

data.name: Magikarp
data.flavorText: A Magikarp living for many years can leap a mountain using Splash. The move remains useless, though.

data.name: Magnemite
data.flavorText: The faster the units at its sides rotate, the greater the magnetic force they generate.

data.name: Mankey
data.flavorText: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

data.name: Meditite
data.flavorText: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.

data.name: Meowth
data.flavorText: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

data.name: Mime Jr.
data.flavorText: It mimics the expressions and motions of those it sees to understand the feelings of others.

data.name: Mudkip
data.flavorText: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

data.name: Nincada
data.flavorText: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.

data.name: Pachirisu
data.flavorText: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

data.name: Paras
data.flavorText: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host Paras.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.

data.name: Piplup
data.flavorText: A poor walker, it often falls down. However, its strong pride makes it puff up its chest without a care.

data.name: Rhyhorn
data.flavorText: Its powerful tackles can destroy anything. However, it is too slow witted to help people work.

data.name: Roselia
data.flavorText: The more healthy the Roselia, the more pleasant its flowers' aroma. Its scent deeply relaxes people.

data.name: Sandshrew
data.flavorText: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

data.name: Seel
data.flavorText: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.

data.name: Shinx
data.flavorText: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

data.name: Shroomish
data.flavorText: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

data.name: Skorupi
data.flavorText: As soon as the tail claws close, its needle tips secrete poison. It can survive a year without food.

data.name: Starly
data.flavorText: Because they are weak individually, they form groups. However, they bicker if the group grows too big.

data.name: Surskit
data.flavorText: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

data.name: Turtwig
data.flavorText: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist.

data.name: Whismur
data.flavorText: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs. If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.

data.name: Zubat
data.flavorText: It checks its surroundings and location using reflections of the ultrasonic waves from its mouth.

data.name: Articuno
data.flavorText: This legendary Pokémon is said to freeze the water in the air during winter, causing snow.

data.name: Moltres
data.flavorText: The flames on this legendary Pokémon's wings burn so brightly that they can make night seem like day.

data.name: Zapdos
data.flavorText: This legendary Pokémon is said to be present wherever there is a lightning storm.

data.name: Milotic
data.flavorText: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.

data.name: Relicanth
data.flavorText: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

data.name: Yanma
data.flavorText: It can hover in one spot by flapping its wings at high speed. It flits about to guard its territory.
